skillTree.localised_description: Dat runty shaman finks he's da greatest d'ere is. Give 'em da teef... for now.
You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: The Goblin Shamans of the Little Waaagh! can cast a shroud across their army, setting up the most perfect ambushes.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: Little Waaagh! spells are surprisingly sneaky – subtle, even, which is much more surprising for those on the wrong end of one!

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for Little Waaagh! spells
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: The Spider-God's smallest minions spin webs all over the enemy's supplies.

effects.description:
Enemy reload time reduction: -4%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Shamans from the Wolf Lands can empower their WAAAGH! with swiftness.
No one wants to cross a Goblin Shaman.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Get your hands off that!

effects.description:

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Oi! I fink I found somethin'.

effects.description:
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Pop a shroom, cast a spell. Pop a shroom...

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -5% for all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -15% for all spells

skillTree.localised_description: I ain't dyin' today.
Mork will sort it.

Ammunition: -2% for Artillery units

skillTree.localised_description: Listen here, yoo's merely adopted the dark; I was born in it, molded by it...

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Squig units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.
Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.
Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

Winds of Magic power reserve: -2 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -4 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -6 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: With the right amount of preparation, everything can harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +2% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +3% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: No one is allowed in or out without my express permission. This is for their safety, of course.

effects.description:
Construction time: -1 for all buildings (minimum of 1 turn)
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Someday he's gonna be a Boss. Can you believe someday we'll work for 'im?"

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(all units in army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.
"Dat a 'shroom in yer pouch? Give it! Give it to me!"

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Goblin and Night Goblin units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: You can't keep a good 'danca' down, especially when those drums start bangin'!

effects.description:
Leadership: -5 for enemy Lords and embedded Heroes
	(enemy armies in region)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(own armies in region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +25%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: My magicks is da best! You fink otha'wise? C'mere, I's got somefing ta show ya...
